entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ChangeToNoGeneratedDocumentsUpdatesListCorrectly is flaky #56826
  • Replace usage of IVsTextManager4.GetUserPreferences4 with free-threaded alternative #56815
    17.1
  • API Proposal: GeneratedKind.SourceGenerator #56810
    17.1
  • Synthesized delegate types do not include BeginInvoke() or EndInvoke() #56808
    17.1
  • Duplicated project when reading sln when multiple TargetPlatforms are specified #56806
  • How to properly use nullable analysis attributes for a method that validates an object properties #56800

Closed

  • CS8620, CS8634 mis-firing on extension method invocation with implied generic type args #56788
    17.0
  • Custom equality operator in generic expressions provoke BadImageFormatExceptions #56376
    17.0
  • Tool to help locating C# global code causing CS7022 for the real Main() #54950
  • Error CS8032 An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from (...) #56738
  • `StackAllocArrayCreationExpressionSyntax.Update` does not account for the `stackAllocKeyword` parameter #56740
    17.1
  • Compiler raising CS1513 & 1514 in response to file scoped namespace on .NET6 RC1 using VS2019 16.11.3 Preview 1.0 #56542
  • CS0121 Compilation error with .NET 6 and delegates #56807
    17.0.P5
  • DoesNotReturn isn't enforced on local functions #52598
    17.0.P5
  • Nullable analysis of non-returning local functions #45814
    17.0.P5
  • Local functions don't report warnings for NotNull/NotNullWhen/NotNullIfNotNull #47896
    17.0.P5
  • Report warnings from nullable analysis of lambda expressions with attributes #52827
    17.0.P5
  • Compiler error message with unresolved parameter placeholders in VS2019 16.11: "ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1}" #55863
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid UI dependency in CloudCache by passing along the solution folder #56829
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require the platform cache service in our package to ensure it's included when we are installed #56820
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.P5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1391151 #56817
    auto-merge
  • Enable async lightbulbs in 17.0 #56816
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Account for a ref returning lambda as a local variable initializer. #56814
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Port perf fix to release/dev17.0 #56805
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Analysis of attributes in conversions of lambdas #56792
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.1
  • See through ref pointer indirection when optimizing stack locals #56790
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix null type argument inference with T? #56789
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.0
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56824
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56821
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56823
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disable IntelliCode line completions for integration tests #56819
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge PR 56717 into release/dev17.0 #56818
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56813
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move merge-conflict-fixes into the high-priority fix bucket. #56761
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: fix build break #56809
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56811
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56812
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add EditorBrowsable(Never) for obsolete method #56767
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure ReferenceCountedDisposable<T>.WeakReference is pointer-sized #56764
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 17.1-vs-deps back to main-vs-deps #56778
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Fix unused Update parameter #56741
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add property to errors in errorlist to prevent the error service from… #56785
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56803
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56802
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56801
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Don't compute edits on zero-length semantic token sets #56774
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP, 17.0
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56799
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge 17.1 back to main #56777
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56795
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData #56784
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Only force compute document diagnostics for the requ… #56696
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Correctly reparse generated files when parse options change #56786
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56781
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56782
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56831
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, UX Review Requested
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Emit compiler version to Windows PDB #56759
    Area-Compilers
  • Add undo support for Remove Unused References. #55356
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Make serializable option almost only a mapping from option keys to values. #56710
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Fix failure to track async operations #55961
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Diagnostics TaggerDelay #56354
    Area-IDE
  • Tighten enforcement of naming convention for local functions #56680
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Explicitly report an exception on the host side when nav-to crashes #56682
    Area-IDE
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
